parameters.name: UDir_X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the U direction

parameters.name: UDir_Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the U direction

parameters.name: UDir_Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the U direction

title: IRenderMaterial.SetUDirection2
description: Sets the U direction of the texture-based appearance.
signature:
void SetUDirection2( 
   System.Double
UDir_X
,
   System.Double
UDir_Y
,
   System.Double
UDir_Z
)

parameters.name: UDir_X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the U direction

parameters.name: UDir_Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the U direction

parameters.name: UDir_Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the U direction

remarks:
To specify the U direction in the X direction, set:
UDir_X to 1.0.
UDir_Y to 0.0.
UDir_Z to 0.0.
Call
IRenderMaterial::SetVDirection2
to set the V direction of the appearance.
